message.body:
I  need to send this story to a younger fellow, who thinks he knows the stock market better than I do, yet his wealth is just a fraction compared to mine -:)  
  
An old man is selling watermelons.  
His pricelist reads: 1 for $3, 3 for $10  
  
A young man stops by and asks to buy one watermelon.  
"That'd be 3 dollars", says the old man.  
  
The young man then buys another one, and another one, paying $3 for each.  
  
As the young man is walking away, he turns around, grins, and says, "Hey old man, do you realize I just bought three watermelons for only $9? Maybe business is not your thing."  
  
The old man smiles and mumbles to himself, "People are funny. Every time they buy three watermelons instead of one, yet they keep trying to teach me how to do business..."  :)  
  
$AAPL $TSLA $SPY $AMD $AMZN

links.title: (BRK), Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) - Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway's Cash Pile Tops Record With $149.2B, Sold Net $2B Of Stock In Third Quarter
links.description: According to Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc.'s (NYSE: BRK) third-quarter earnings report, the company's cash stockpile hit new heights at $149.2 billion, surpassing the previous record of $146.6 billion set in 2Q 2020. Buffett's conglomerate, which holds stakes in Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL), Coca-Cola Co (NYSE: KO), and other public companies, has spent $1.4 billion on stocks and sold $3.4 billion worth in the period.

body: $AAPL Another green week. Just climbing that ladder
$SPY $AAPL nope. Just printed money getting circulated. And we keep printing more.
(Nov 6, 2021) $ZNGA $AAPL Game of the Day

$GSAT $AAPL the rumored tie-up between Apple and Globalstar is far from a rumor according to TMF.  We know there is a mystery Customer conducting engineering studies using Globalstar’s assets.  Apple has recently filed for 2 patents regarding Unmanned Drones using 3gpp 5g / lte -RAN Spectrum.  Apple does not own any private spectrum and goes out of its way not to identify the spectrum utilized for this patent.  Globalstar has recent 3gpp approved 5G / LTE Spectrum ideal for this use.  The customer had Globalstar sign an NDA engineering agreement shortly after GSAT obtained this approval.  Apple has been very quiet about Satellite tech esp during a time when every competitor is trying to launch Satellites.  The non-denial of the rumors by both sides and these secretive filings are too much to discount.   It appears like Apple wants upgrades to GSAT’s Satellite system and GSAT is wanting more money to pay for it.  The end result could be a buyout.

links.title: Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway's Cash Pile Tops Record With $149.2B, Sold Net $2B Of Stock In Third Quarter
links.description: According to Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc.'s (NYSE: BRK) third-quarter earnings report, the company's cash stockpile hit new heights at $149.2 billion, surpassing the previous record of $146.6 billion set in 2Q 2020. Buffett's conglomerate, which holds stakes in Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL), Coca-Cola Co (NYSE: KO), and other public companies, has spent $1.4 billion on stocks and sold $3.4 billion worth in the period.
